entry.title: Introduction to Orchard CMS and Theme Development Training Conducted
entry.content:
Today, I conducted a one-on-one training session on Introduction to Orchard CMS and Theme Development for a company in Mumbai.

Ajay Navgale - Founder, CentraLogic Consultancy

entry.title: Conducted Orchard CMS Training for MTC-CRM
entry.content:
Today, I conducted an online training session for 5 hours on Orchard CMS for MTC-CRM.

Company Feedback:

We found the course and training on Orchard very useful and will hopefully be able to put all of it into practice. Thanks Abhishek to put a great effort and looking forward for next sessions.

Rakesh Agarwal â€“ Co-Founder
